channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
channel.desc: Animation, Fantasy, Family 2006 With the global warming impact on the Ice Age and floods breaking out, Manny and his friends embark on a dangerous journey to the other side of the valley to survive. Along the way, Manny discovers he's not the last mammoth on Earth. John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano, Seann William Scott, Josh Peck, Carlos Saldanha, Peter Gaulke , Peter Gaulke.
